Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
template<unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
struct VecMath::Matrix< D, N >::VecMath::Matrix::MultiplyInnerLoop< i, j, 0, D_ >

Calculate an element of the product of two matrices.

Inner loop of a matrix multiplication
Specialization for k = 0 (the first element of the row vector by col vector multiplication).
